questions.question: 1) What is the primary function of an Analog-to-Digital Converter (ADC)?

answers.a: Convert digital signals into analog signals
answers.b: Convert analog signals into digital signals

questions.question: 2) Which factor determines the smallest change an ADC can detect?
3) How many steps does a 10-bit ADC have?
4) If an ADC has a reference voltage (Vref) of 5V and a resolution of 8 bits, what is the step size?
5) What does the ADCON0 register control in an ADC module?

answers.d: Selecting the analog input channel and starting the conversion
